Name: Sir Bedivere
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with a Relic Long Sword.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Models in this Formation may-re-roll failed wound rolls of 1 when attacking enemy LEGENDARY Formations in the Melee Combat Step.
When this model completes a charge, improve the Rend Characteristic of this model’s Relic Long Sword by 2 until the end of the Round.
